message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: So, in your will, you're giving away your epic meme collection?
Him: Only if you promise to keep the meme legacy alive. And don't forget my legendary TikTok drafts, pure gold.

CONVERSATION 2
Her: Leaving anything cool in your will for me?
Him: You get exclusive rights to my Spotify playlists. They're almost as fire as you are.

CONVERSATION 3
Her: What's in your will? Your collection of hoodies?
Him: Yeah, and each one comes with a hug from me. They're limited edition, just like us.

CONVERSATION 4
Her: Your will better have something sweet for me.
Him: Sweet? How about my secret candy stash? But the real treasure is my dog's Instagram account.

CONVERSATION 5
Her: I better be in that will for your priceless gaming skills.
Him: Oh, you are. You inherit my gamer tag and all my epic wins. But you gotta promise to keep my streak going.
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

        Here is the sample conversation-

        Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
        Him : yes yes yes. totally.

        An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

        CONVERSATION 1
        Her : im super wise wtf
        Him : of course, Socrates ;)
        ,

        CONVERSATION 2
        Her : im so smart
        Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

        I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

        I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

        Here is your prompt. 
        Her : Her : in your will.. that distributes all of your non existent monetary assets ?.  
        Him : Him : when i die.... please play peanut butter jelly time lakshya the second. yes..... and my fortnite vbucks. lmao i might actually do the peanut butter jelly time thing though. 

        Your Conversations must be of the format :
        CONVERSATION
        Her : 'message'
        Him : 'message'.

        I want just the conversations. No filler messages or content which AI usually gives.

        Thanks bro.
